00045 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

00048 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 u32 gCAP_Counter;
00050 u32 gCompensate_Counter;

00053 /*********************************************************************************************************//**

00055  * @retval  None
00056  ************************************************************************************************************/
00057 void NMI_Handler(void)
00058 {
00059 }
00060 
00061 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00062  * @brief   This function handles Hard Fault exception.
00063  * @retval  None
00064  ************************************************************************************************************/
00065 void HardFault_Handler(void)
00066 {
00067   #if 1
00068 
00069   static vu32 gIsContinue = 0;
00070   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00071   /* For development FW, MCU run into the while loop when the hardfault occurred.                           */
00072   /* 1. Stack Checking                                                                                      */
00073   /*    When a hard fault exception occurs, MCU push following register into the stack (main or process     */
00074   /*    stack). Confirm R13(SP) value in the Register Window and typing it to the Memory Windows, you can   */
00075   /*    check following register, especially the PC value (indicate the last instruction before hard fault).*/
00076   /*    SP + 0x00    0x04    0x08    0x0C    0x10    0x14    0x18    0x1C                                   */
00077   /*           R0      R1      R2      R3     R12      LR      PC    xPSR                                   */
00078   while (gIsContinue == 0)
00079   {
00080   }
00081   /* 2. Step Out to Find the Clue                                                                           */
00082   /*    Change the variable "gIsContinue" to any other value than zero in a Local or Watch Window, then     */
00083   /*    step out the HardFault_Handler to reach the first instruction after the instruction which caused    */
00084   /*    the hard fault.                                                                                     */
00085   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00086 
00087   #else
00088 
00089   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00090   /* For production FW, you shall consider to reboot the system when hardfault occurred.                    */
00091   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00092   NVIC_SystemReset();
00093 
00094   #endif
00095 }
00096

00113 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00114  * @brief   This function handles SysTick Handler.
00115  * @retval  None
00116  ************************************************************************************************************/
00117 void SysTick_Handler(void)
00118 {
00119   /* DISABLE TM channel capture timer and 100ms Counter                                                     */
00120   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, DISABLE);
00121   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_DISABLE);
00122 
00123   /* Show the Value, OverflowCounter and CAP Timer Counter                                                  */
00124   printf("==============================\r\n");
00125   printf("OverflowCounter   = %05d\r\n", (OverflowCounter));
00126   printf("CAP Timer Counter = %05d\r\n", (TM_GetCounter(HTCFG_CAP_PORT)));
00127 
00128   /* Counter Overflow will being at 0, so OverflowCounter need multiply 65536                               */
00129   gCAP_Counter = ((OverflowCounter)*65536)+(TM_GetCounter(HTCFG_CAP_PORT));
00130 
00131   /* Every 10K count will be one less, so compensate back                                                   */
00132   gCompensate_Counter = (gCAP_Counter/10000);
00133 
00134   /* Show the Value, Freq_divd_by_10 and Input Signal Freq                                                  */
00135   printf("Freq_divd_by_10   = %05d\r\n", (gCAP_Counter+gCompensate_Counter));
00136   printf("Input Signal Freq = %05d Hz\r\n", (gCAP_Counter+gCompensate_Counter)*10);
00137 
00138   /* Clear related counter value and all interrupt flags                                                    */
00139   OverflowCounter = 0;
00140   TM_SetCounter(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, 0);
00141   TM_ClearIntPendingBit(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_INT_TEV | TM_INT_UEV);
00142 
00143   /* Enable TM Channel Trigger Event interrupt                                                              */
00144   TM_IntConfig(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_INT_TEV, ENABLE);
00145 
00146   /* ENABLE TM channel capture timer                                                                        */
00147   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, ENABLE);
00148 }
